channel.title: Run box closes instantly?!
channel.description:
okay well i got my VPS (virtualy private server) ($68 plan with 3GB of ram, 3.02GB)
and i put my files onto it, currently moving the rest of the old character files onto it atm
but when i try to run runserver.bat
it just opens the blackbox for 0.329108ms then closes
in other words, u just see a black box blink really fast heres my questions....
1) what causes this? 2) how do i fix it?
rep++ for da help ;)

item.title: Run box closes instantly?!
item.dc:creator: @i_aint_yo_mama i aint yo mama
item.description:
@i_aint_yo_mama wrote:

If yo havnt figured it out already then…

Change your Path (in the bottom box) to

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

and CLASSPATH to

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Now on your desktop it should have an icon that says JDK-6_13-win… open that up and install the java version.

Read full topic

item.title: Run box closes instantly?!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Your Environment Variables Fail!
They should be: (If you have the most recent JDK Update)

Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%system%;%system%\system32
classpath: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6

Read full topic

item.title: Run box closes instantly?!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Try editing your path to say C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

I’m really damn tired right now it’s hard for me to concentrate. Try switching your path to that, but incase i doesn’t work, keep your old path before deleting it.

webber:

Obviously you know nothing about the base source you used to use haha, must of used mysql in the past “MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server”. I’m taking mysql has been removed.

Dude, just about every run.bat says that line of message in it about mysql… I didn’t even know wtf you were talking about…
